```{r}
library(tidyverse)
d <- rtdists::speed_acc |> 
  tibble::as_tibble() |> 
  mutate(
    correct = as.character(response) == as.character(stim_cat),
    correct = as.numeric(correct),
  )
d$stim_cat
d$response
d
ggplot(d) + aes(x = id, y = correct, color = condition) + stat_summary() + facet_wrap(~stim_cat)

```
